summary: Ogami Itto volunteers to be tortured by the yakuza to save a prostitute and is hired by their leader to kill an evil chamberlain.
cast: Tomisaburô Wakayama|Gô Katô|Yûko Hama|Isao Yamagata|Michitarô Mizushima|Ichirô Nakatani|Akihiro Tomikawa|Sayoko Katô|Jun Hamamura|Daigo Kusano|Shun'ya Wazaki|Hiroshi Nawa|Sakai Umezu|Saburô Date|Hatsuo Yamaya|Kazuma Otabe|Yukio Horikita|Toru Yamaguchi|Tadashi Iwata|Daisuke Shiraba|Katsutoshi Akiyama|Shingo Ibuki|Naoki Ando|Takako Ashizawa|Daisuke Awachia|Masaru Shiga|Fumio Terauchi|Mayoko Kikuno|Katsuyoshi Baba|Kiroko Arakawa|Tôru Abe
keywords: ninja|opening action scene|hand to hand combat|gunfight|shootout
title: Kozure Ôkami: Shinikazeni mukau ubaguruma
